list.abs: ...苍头燕雀（学名Fringilla coelebs）是一种燕雀属的小型雀科|雀类。苍头燕雀身长约14-16厘米，各翼上有双白道。发情期的雄性苍头燕雀很容易辨认，且喙呈灰色， 下体呈红色。雌性苍头燕雀色调略为单调、偏绿。== 分布 ==苍头燕雀的分布范围为欧洲、北非至西亚。http://www.

auth_sentence.content: These remaining lone males give rise to their Latin name "coelebs" meaning bachelor.
auth_sentence.res_content: These remaining lone males give rise to their Latin name "coelebs" meaning bachelor.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: These remaining lone males give rise to their Latin name "coelebs" meaning bachelor.
